original_text: Then they asked him, ‘What did he do to you? How did he make your eyes able to see?’
korean_text: 그들이 이르되 그 사람이 네게 무엇을 하였느냐 어떻게 네 눈을 뜨게 하였느냐

sentences.original_text: What did he do to you?
How did he make your eyes able to see?
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 어떻게 당신의 눈이 보이게 만들었습니까?
